about.p_1_1: of children, the duality between the complexity of developing a personality and having fun during childhood, realizing that all references are valid for enrichment and that one can never be too curious. Understood through irony and play, one
about.p_2: , representing what we are supposed to leave behind but refuse to lose. It is the hidden version we all have in adulthood, embodying creativity, fun, and freedom from prejudice.

legal_notice.title: Legal Notice
legal_notice.introduction: Welcome to the Legal Notice of Cillan World S.L. (hereinafter, "Cillan World" or "the Company"). This document sets out the legal terms and conditions under which we operate our website and related services. By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions.

legal_notice.company_address: Registered office: Calle de la Moda 123, 28001 Madrid, Spain
legal_notice.p1: This legal notice governs the use of the website and the services offered by the owner. Below is the corporate information required by applicable regulations.
legal_notice.p2_1: This website aims to inform about products and allow the purchase of items offered by

cookies_notice.title: Cookies policy
cookies_notice.p1: This policy describes the cookies used on this website and the options available to manage them. It is consistent with the cookie banner and complies with GDPR and LSSI.
cookies_notice.p2: Cookies are small files stored on your device that help remember preferences or improve the browsing experience.
cookies_notice.p3: We currently only use technical cookies necessary for the site to function. We do not use analytics or advertising cookies.
cookies_notice.p4: It remembers the selected language. Approximate duration: 12 months. Type: technical.
cookies_notice.p5: We do not set third-party cookies on this website. If they are added in the future, the banner will request your consent before enabling them.
cookies_notice.how_to_manage_cookies: How to manage or block cookies
cookies_notice.p6: You can allow, block, or delete cookies in your browser settings. Note that blocking technical cookies may affect the proper functioning of the site.
cookies_notice.p7_1: For any questions about privacy or cookies, write to

privacy_policy.p1_4: This policy summarizes what data we collect, why we use it, and how you can exercise your rights.

privacy_policy.p5_1: You can request access, rectification, erasure, restriction, portability, or objection at any time by emailing
privacy_policy.p5_2: with the subject "Data protection". If you believe we have not addressed your rights, you can file a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency.
privacy_policy.p6: We apply TLS encryption, access controls, and periodic reviews to protect your data. We retain information only as long as necessary to provide the service and comply with legal obligations (e.g., invoices for five years).
